name: Firebase
description: Integrate with Firebase to list, get, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Documents
tools.description: List documents in a Firestore collection. Returns document IDs and field summaries.

tools.name: Get Document
tools.description: Get a single Firestore document by its full path (collection/documentId).

tools.name: Create Document
tools.description: Create a new document in a Firestore collection. Provide fields as key-value pairs.

tools.name: Update Document
tools.description: Update fields on an existing Firestore document. Only specified fields are updated.

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Run a structured query against a Firestore collection. Supports field filters, ordering, and limits.

projectId.label: Firebase Project ID
projectId.description: Your Firebase project ID (found in Firebase Console settings)
